attributes.action: Pressure the government of UAE against imposing the ban on Pakistani news channels
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government of UAE on the pressure of the military government in Pakistan has ordered the two Pakistani news channels Geo News and Aryone World to stop airing from UAE. This has resulted in the two channels unable to show news and current affiars all over the world including UK. The UK government should condemn this action by UAE government of supporting a military dictator. The UK should also pressurise the government of UAE to lift the restrictions imposed on the pakistani news channels in todays democratic world where everyone should have the freedom of speech.
